permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery

Class GuaranteedJobHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJobHelper

  • public final class GuaranteedJobHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Trading Networks delivery jobs.

      • normalize

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob normalize(com.wm.data.IData input)
        Returns a GuaranteedJob, if given either a subset or full GuaranteedJob as an IData document.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData document which could be a GuaranteedJob, or could be a subset of a GuaranteedJob that includes an TaskId key.
        Returns:
        The GuaranteedJob associated with the given IData document.

      • list

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob[] list(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all delivery queue jobs associated with the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The BizDocEnvelope to return all associated jobs for.
        Returns:
        An array of all delivery queue jobs associated with the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • list

        public static java.lang.String[] list(java.lang.String internalID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all delivery queue jobs associated with the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Parameters:
        internalID - The internal ID of the BizDocEnvelope to return all associated jobs for.
        Returns:
        An array of all delivery queue job IDs associated with the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • restart

        public static void restart(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job)
        Restarts the given job. This method, unlike JobMgr.restartJob, does not require the job status to be "STOPPED" or "FAILED", and will restart the given job regardless of its status.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be restarted.

      • setRetryStrategy

        public static void setRetryStrategy(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job,
                                    int retryLimit,
                                    float retryFactor,
                                    javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait)
                             throws com.wm.app.tn.profile.ProfileStoreException,
                                    java.sql.SQLException
        Update the retry settings on the given job using the given settings, or the retry settings on the receiver's profile if the given retryLimit is less than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be updated.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time to wait between each retry.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.tn.profile.ProfileStoreException - If a database error is encountered.
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error is encountered.

      • setRetryStrategy

        public static void setRetryStrategy(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job,
                                    int retryLimit,
                                    float retryFactor,
                                    long timeToWait)
                             throws com.wm.app.tn.profile.ProfileStoreException,
                                    java.sql.SQLException
        Update the retry settings on the given job using the given settings, or the retry settings on the receiver's profile if the given retryLimit is less than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be updated.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time in milliseconds to wait between each retry.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.tn.profile.ProfileStoreException - If a database error is encountered.
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error is encountered.

      • setDelivering

        protected static void setDelivering(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update the given job's status to "DELIVERING".
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be updated.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error is encountered.

      • save

        public static void save(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.sql.SQLException
        Saves the given job to the Trading Networks database. This method differs from job.save() as this method preserves the job's updated time rather than setting it to current time as job.save() does, and supports updating the job's created time if it has changed.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be saved.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error is encountered.
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error is encountered.

      • hasUnrecoverableErrors

        public static boolean hasUnrecoverableErrors(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job)
                                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the owning BizDocEnvelope for the given GuaranteedJob has any unrecoverable errors.
        Parameters:
        job - The GuaranteedJob to check for unrecoverable errors.
        Returns:
        True if the given GuaranteedJob has unrecoverable errors.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • log

        public static void log(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job,
                       java.lang.String type,
                       java.lang.String klass,
                       java.lang.String summary,
                       java.lang.String message)
                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Adds an activity log statement to the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - The GuaranteedJob to add the activity log statement to.
        type - The type of message to be logged.
        klass - The class of the message to be logged.
        summary - The summary of the message to be logged.
        message - The detail of the message to be logged.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs while logging.
